name: June 30th
description:
Welcome to Hotel Paradise! The view may be average, but the beds are so comfy, you'll never want to leave. What's more, there's a rumor: some say if you collect a lot of souvenirs, your wish will be granted. Are you up to the challenge?

Created for the 3rd Dream Diary Jam. May contain bugs and absolutely will contain dead ends! Sorry about that! There's only so much you can do in six weeks.

Controls:

Z - Action

Esc - Open the Menu

5 - While dreaming, you will wake up

Arrow Keys - Move that weird purple haired girl around

Creator Links:

Art Blog|Ko-Fi
